<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3370</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3370</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Comsoc: Laboratori de geografia</string>
            <string language="en">Comsoc: Geography laboratory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Comsoc: Geographielabor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comsoc : Laboratoire de géographie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comsoc: Laboratório da geografia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comsoc: Laboratorio di geografia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Comsoc: Εργαστήριο γεωγραφίας</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Selecció de recursos de Geografia distribuïts en tres apartats:
- Pràctica: proposta de treball de laboratori (recollida de dades, anàlisi, simulació, hipòtesi de treball...) sobre recursos humans i població a Catalunya,
- Simulacions: amb una miniaplicació sobre terratrèmols,
- Glossari: amb entrades de temes de geografia de la població.</string>
            <string language="en">Selection of resources for geography in three sections:  Practical activity in the laboratory (gathering data, analysis, simulation, working hypothesis, etc.) on human resources and the population in Catalonia;  Simulation with a mini application on earthquakes;  Glossary of terms used in human geography.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">creixement de la població</string>
            <string language="en">demographic development</string>
            <string language="es">crecimiento de la población</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">recursos econòmics</string>
            <string language="en">economic resources</string>
            <string language="es">recursos económicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">immigrant</string>
            <string language="en">immigrant</string>
            <string language="es">inmigrante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">població</string>
            <string language="en">population</string>
            <string language="es">población</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">conflicte social</string>
            <string language="en">social conflict</string>
            <string language="es">conflicto social</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auswahl der Betriebsmittel für Geographie in 
drei Kapiteln: - praktische Aktivität im Labor (Daten, Analyse,
Simulation, Funktion Hypothese, usw. erfassend.) auf 
menschlichen Betriebsmitteln und der Bevölkerung in Katalonien; 
- Simulation mit einer Minianwendung auf Erdbeben; - 
Glossar der Bezeichnungen verwendet in der menschlichen Geographie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sélection des ressources pour la géographie 
dans trois sections : - activité pratique dans le laboratoire 
(recueillant des données, l'analyse, la simulation, l'hypothèse de 
fonctionnement, etc...) sur les ressources humaines et la 
population en Catalogne ; - simulation avec une mini application
sur des tremblements de terre ; - glossaire des termes utilisés
dans la géographie humaine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seleção dos recursos para a geografia em três 
seções: - atividade prática no laboratório (que recolhe 
dados, análise, simulação, hipótese de funcionamento, etc..) 
em recursos humanos e na população em Catalonia; - 
simulação com uma aplicação mini em terremotos; - glossário
dos termos usados na geografia humana.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Selezione delle risorse per geografia in tre 
sezioni: - attività pratica in laboratorio (che riunisce
i dati, analisi, simulazione, ipotesi di lavoro, ecc.) sulle 
risorse umane e sulla popolazione in Catalogna; - simulazione 
con una mini applicazione sui terremoti; - glossario dei termini
usati nella geografia umana.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιλογή των στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς για τη γεωγραφία σε
τρία τμήματα: - Πρακτική δραστηριότητα στο εργαστήριο (που 
συγκεντρώνει τα στοιχεία, την ανάλυση, την προσομοίωση, την 
υπόθεση εργασίας, κ.λπ....) στο ανθρώπινο δυναμικό και τον 
πληθυσμό στην Καταλωνία  - Προσομοίωση με μια μίνι εφαρμογή
στους σεισμούς  - Γλωσσάρι όρων που χρησιμοποιούνται στην 
ανθρώπινη γεωγραφία.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">demographische Entwicklung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ökonomische Betriebsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Immigrant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bevölkerung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozial$überschneidung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">développement démographique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ressources économiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">immigré</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">population</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">conflit social</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">desenvolvimento demográfico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">recursos econômicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">immigrant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">população</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">conflito social</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sviluppo demografico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">risorse economiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">immigrante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">popolazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">conflitto sociale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δημογραφική ανάπτυξη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οικονομικά στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετανάστης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πληθυσμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κοινωνική σύγκρουση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
